channel.title: Butterfly & Beautyfly
channel.itunes:subtitle: The series that gives little ones wings.
channel.itunes:author: Bron & Bendix
channel.itunes:summary: Butterfly & Beautyfly are two naive but happy butterflies. Together they flutter here and there, understanding and learning about their small world. Every corner of the garden, each moment and encounter gives them an opportunity to grow. There are so many beautiful and interesting things to find out about and to experience on the road to independence
channel.description: Butterfly & Beautyfly are two naive but happy butterflies. Together they flutter here and there, understanding and learning about their small world. There are so many beautiful and interesting things to find out about and to experience on the road to independence
